Player History
Released by Philadelphia on 4/1/1965...
Drafted in 2nd round, 23rd overall pick, by Houston in 1968...
Injured on 6/3/1968 with a Bruised Heel, out for 3 days...
Injured on 7/31/1972 with a Bruised Heel, out for 1-2 weeks...
Injured on 7/24/1973 with a Stiff Shoulder, out for 3 days...
Had first career hit (homerun) on 6/21/1976, off Les Cain (CIN)...
Won World Series with Houston in 1979...
Won Player of the Week award on 4/21/1982, hitting .577 with 1 HR, 4 RBI...
Won Gold Glove Award at First Base in 1983...
